reviewText: A good history and I so much appreciate our soldiers.  They went through hell to protect our United States.  I think this film should be shown in high schools throughout our nation.

Excellent documentary
My team was training for the Bataan Memorial march held in White Sands every March
We wanted to know more about the event
This was a perfect documentary for us
A horrific event that needs to be told. Done well...history does repeat itself.
Good history that everyone should know about. These men were true heros.
Very sad, painful story of our history that needs to be told. I use this video in my terrorism class as a teaching aid.
Very informative show When I go back to the Philippines it be on the top of my list to see to honer the men who died there
